detail_desc: Short jersey top with a round neckline, short sleeves and an open back with ties at the hem.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey.
Double-breasted coat in soft faux fur with notch lapels, dropped shoulders and diagonal welt pockets. Recycled polyester lining.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with terry inside.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a small print motif on one sleeve, seam centre front and asymmetric hem. Longer at the back.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set with two pairs of fully lined bikini bottoms. One solid colour pair, one patterned pair with frills at the top.

Round bag in braided paper straw with a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Narrow metal chain shoulder strap and metal rings at the sides that can be pulled up and used as handles. Lined. Depth 6 cm. Diameter 21 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Cropped blouse in an airy weave with a smocked bodice and a frill-trimmed, square neckline. Short puff sleeves with concealed elastication over the shoulders and frill-trimmed, smocked hems.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.

Set in soft, organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved wrapover bodysuit with press-studs down the sides and at the crotch. Top with long raglan sleeves and press-studs down one side. Trousers with an elasticated waist and full feet with elastication at the heels. Hat with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Hi-tops with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles.
STUDIO COLLECTION. 5-pocket jacquard-patterned trousers in slub-weave cotton canvas with a regular waist, zip fly and gently tapering legs.

Set with a hat and mittens in a fine knit containing glittery threads. Jersey-lined hat with a faux fur pompom on top and ribbed hem. Jersey-lined mittens with ribbed cuffs. Size 2-6 months with no thumbs.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Sports joggers in heavy jersey with taped details. Elasticated, drawstring waist and zipped side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for added mobility and wide ribbing at the hems. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.
Hat in a rib-knit wool blend with a turned-up hem.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a padded, drawstring hood, high collar and two-way zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, flap front pockets with press-studs and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a concealed drawstring at the waist for an adjustable fit. Lined.
Metal hair clips with fabric flower-shaped appliqués.
Shirt in checked cotton flannel with a collar and chest pocket. Regular fit.
Short-sleeved top in printed jersey.

Cropped bomber jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud, and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Taffeta lining made from recycled polyester.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Front and back pockets and tapered legs.
Sleeveless dresses in soft cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts in cotton jersey. T-shirt with a motif on the chest. Patterned shorts with an elasticated waist, side pockets and fake fly.
Bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and a round neckline with gathers at the front. Frill-trimmed hems and press-studs at the crotch.

Negligee in an airy weave with mesh-lined, lace cups with removable inserts. Double, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, an elasticated seam under the bust and flare to the hem.

Jacket in nylon with a mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, chest pockets, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Elasticated cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Fitted V-neck top in lustrous jersey with a lace trim around the neckline and long sleeves.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft, fine-knit modal and cotton blend with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Padded parka in woven fabric with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip with a wind flap and hook-and-loop fastening down the front, flap chest and front pockets with a press-stud and two additional zipped front pockets. Concealed drawstring at the waist and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton canvas with a high waist, zip fly, patch front pockets, fake flap back pockets and gently tapered legs.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Print motif on the chest, a fabric appliqué just above the hem and trims around the neckline and sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slippers in soft, rib-knit chenille. Fold-down shaft with an opening at the back and a faux fur lining. Pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Scarf in patterned silk. Size 80x80 cm.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a sheen. Long sleeves with elastication around the top and overlocked edges around the top, sleeves and hem.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Spacious handbag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top. Three inner compartments, one with a zip, and studs on the bottom. Lined. Size 15x30x36 cm.
Dungarees in washed denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps, a chest pocket, front and back pockets, buttons at the sides and tapered legs.
Sandals in imitation leather. Ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Checked jacket in a cotton weave with a solid colour collar, buttons down the front, side pockets and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.
Nightdress in soft, printed cotton jersey with long sleeves and a rounded hem.
Leggings with extra space for a growing tummy. 200 denier.
Socks in an airy knit with elasticated tops.
Sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with an elasticated drawstring waist and short slits in the hems.

Super-oversized jacket in organic cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, diagonal welt front pockets and tabs with a button at the back of the hem.

Jumper in rib-knit cotton with a polo neck and long raglan sleeves. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Short coat in a soft, felted wool blend with a wide, faux fur-lined collar. Concealed buttons at the front, a tab with a decorative button at the cuffs and welt side pockets. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.

Weekend bag with two handles and a zip at the top, a detachable adjustable shoulder strap and press-studs in the sides that can be unfastened to make the bag more spacious. Three inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 21x39x41 cm.
Short-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a round neck and button placket.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with wide shoulder straps, press-studs at the top, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder, a small fabric appliqué at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Skinny-fit treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Metal and acetate hoop earrings in various designs. Diameter from 1 cm to 2.5 cm.
Short, V-neck dress in stretch jersey with a wrapover front with ties at one side, and long sleeves.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front, a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Boxy-style top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with appliqués on the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in a crêpe weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, tie belt, pleats at the top, side pockets and tapered legs.
Short, fitted dress in a soft rib knit with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, knee-length dress in jersey made from a linen and viscose blend with a round neckline and wide shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, an opening and button at the back of the neck and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Top in soft faux shearling with a stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Flared skirt in patterned cotton poplin with a smocked waist.
Sandals with straps at the front and a wrapover ankle strap with an adjustable fastener. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
